s.text: Apparently the bad bear didn't show as much concern for eye/ear protection as do Brasco and his dad.
Apparently the bad bear didn't show as much concern for eye/ear protection as do Brasco and his dad.
This could refer to the kosher laws that put pork chops out of bounds, but I doubt it.
"Seamstress Trudie Newell-Poit of Wainscotting, disgusted at her sewing machine's poor cross-stitching, smashed it with a sledgehammer in Piccadilly Circus."
Where is the face sleekened by cheek bones transplanted from a high-school cheerleader kidnapped off the streets of Wichita, Kan.?
